website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy watch that offers excellent fit, functionality, and features at an affordable price point.
pros: Owners appreciate the aesthetically pleasing look, solid construction, and that it is easy to read
Water-resistant, with users praising its ability to be worn while swimming and holding up well to frequent hand washing
cons: A few users experienced issues with the band breaking or becoming discolored
Face is smaller than some expected

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this watch. She has been looking for a simple watch to run, work, and do life with. She is very satisfied. The watch is small, lightweight, and comfortable. It is also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: aTypicalEngineer808

customer_reviews.title: This watch is awesome! I am a pre-nursing student and got this ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is awesome! I am a pre-nursing student and got this watch so I can use it at the hospital. It's got a 24 hour clock and has the date. It's waterproof and works very well, plus it's aesthetically pleasing. I took it with me while vacationing in Hawaii, swam with it several times in the salty Ocean and it still works! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: tina mei ou

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the healthcare field - face is a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Definitely love this watch. The colors are great and fun. The military time is very convenient. I also appreciate that it is water proof as we're constantly washing our hands. The face is a bit smaller than expected. See photos, it's the size of a quarter. I don't have vision issues so it's fine but someone that does may struggle. Just an FYI. Specs are great!! It's easy to clean too, the material of the strap is plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Aragones

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased this watch 2 x, I am ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this watch 2 x, I am a nurse and it matches all my scrubs, it is water proof, light weight and not bulky, very feminine style. I receive a lot of compliments for it. It suits all my needs with real time and military time, date and the face turns for time keeping and tracking. My first purchase was in 2013 I replaced the battery one time. I replaced it this year because the band snapped from every day wear and tear. I was going to just replace the band and noted that buying a whole new watch was cheaper! This is my go to watch .
customer_reviews.author: crmcwhite

customer_reviews.title: Cheap/nice watch for Nursing School - Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I started nursing school on Monday and it shipped to my apartment on time which I liked a lot. It's really clean and shiny and you can see everything quite nicely. It's a nice fit and matches with almost anything. The only reason I gave this product 4 stars is because it was already ticking when I got the watch. I'm going to guess about 18 days since I received it because there's a little square on the inside of the watch screen that displays the number of days passed. Other than that - I love it! Great watch, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nursing student, so the features of this watch are very nice for what I need. Bright colored, bold, dial numbers, date, and military time distinction. It seems tiny at first, but the more I wear it, the more it feels like the perfect size. Plenty big enough to read, but small enough to be out of the way and no bulk. I have very large wrists so I figured I would have to immediately buy a new band, but it fits nice on the largest setting, though I may buy a new band anyway to have room to push it up my arm a little.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Very Impractical for Nursing
customer_reviews.text: I was not pleased with this watch at all. The band is uncomfortable and plastic so your wrist sweats under the band. The numbers on the dial are multicolored, but so light you can not see them unless you are in full light. Watch has no light on the dial, so very impractical for night shifts. The second hand is thin and light colored so it is difficult to see it moving. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: blondbikernurse

customer_reviews.title: stem broke off within days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a birthday gift for my daughter. Since I bought it about a month before her birthday the 30 day return clock started ticking long before it was unboxed. Within the 1st couple of days after her brithday the stem came off but by then it was already past the return window. What a POS watch, and buying things like this off of amazon wasn't smart. I have had great tuff performance from several G-Shock watches and thought this model would be sturdy too but feminine and good for a little girl's gift. These are made in China, not Japan, so it's just sinojunk with a Casio name.
customer_reviews.author: Waray

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, inexpensive watch, which goes with everything. Just wish the numbers were a little larger or it had a back light or something to make it more readable. I don't even wear glasses or contacts and the numbers are just barely big enough to read, in full light. UPDATE***: watch is slow, doesn't tell accurate time but Amazon refuses to refund because the return window is closed. what happened to amazing customer service? guess Amazon is just like all the others now :(
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of this to wear at the sea. Excellent. Pretty, fun. Works well, I just rinse it after I wear it. It has been more than a year and have had no problem with it. My sister in law and my daughter both liked it and I bought each one a different one. After being in the swimming pool both straps got yellow. So sad. Because these are great watches, with an excellent price. Maybe we will buy them again and keep using the yellow ones for the pool 😊😊
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Great, super inexpensive watch
customer_reviews.text: Great, super inexpensive watch. I use this as a nursing student. No problem with it getting wet while washing my hands, which I do usually 3 - 5 times per hour. I like that it's plastic, so I can clean it with alcohol wipes, too ;) It won't last forever, and it's not the fanciest of watches, but it keeps ticking, and the glow in the dark watch hands come in handy when I'm in a darkened room. Of note: it fits well on my medium sized wrist. If you have really large wrists, this probably will not fit. It will fit if you have a very skinny wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: silicone (I think) band so it makes it easy to clean with alcohol swabs
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my clinical rotation in nursing school. The face is kind of small and there really isn't any contrast as the second hand is also white, so it is challenging to see the second hand during assessments to ensure I count a full minute during vitals. It will take some practice and I will have to ensure I have it at the right angle during my count. Attractive watch, silicone (I think) band so it makes it easy to clean with alcohol swabs :) Not sure if I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: La La

customer_reviews.title: Watch face is too small
customer_reviews.text: I have the unisex one in black and love it but the white lacks the same qualities. The watch face is too small, it almost looks like a kid’s watch. You have to squint to see military time. Sadly I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: a great find
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy piece holds up really well after 12.5 hours of work with frequent hand washing and lord knows what else (i'm an RN). Super affordable, arrives quickly, works like a charm, and matches any uniform thanks to its white layout and multicolored numbers. Definitely would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: H.L.

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for Intended Use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a girl we have volunteering with us in the medical field. She does a great job of keeping up with us, I decided to start teaching her the basics, like heart rate, temperature, ans respirations. This watch is perfect, small face size, she is very petite, and has seconds hand. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Cute and gets the job done, but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This watch has been great so far as a nursing student. It is waterproof, which is a must and also looks cute. I love the rainbow numbers and the white band. The best part is that it is extremely affordable. The only issue I have with this watch is it is not very comfortable. The material makes my wrist sweat a little so I find myself messing with it a lot and wanting to take it off. I wouldn’t wear it as an everyday watch, but for now I don’t mind using it while doing my clinical rotations.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 9 Year Old!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a real watch. I looked everywhere for an analog watch that didn't have those ridiculous weave-through straps that are impossible to tighten well enough and get on and off. ENTER THIS WATCH! I love the style, the colors, and the silicone band. It fits her 9 year old wrist wonderfully, she loves the style that goes with everything. The face is easy to read. She can set it herself and she's taught herself how to use the rotating dials on the face as a timer. This is GREAT watch. It's also waterproof which is great when your child forgets to remove her watch when she washes her hands or showers, lol.
customer_reviews.author: APSc

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, terrible battery
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, the reviews are accurate, but I have had this watch for exactly 5 months and there is a problem according to Casio with the battery as it stops randomly and I have reset the time by over 30 minutes three times in the past 2 weeks or so and I don't even wear the watch every day. Would cost almost as much to send it in for repair under warranty as it would for a new one. Sad....
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I have a number of fine watches but during the summer I like a practical, inexpensive and reliable watch for the beach. I really don't like to take my phone and chance that it would get sandy and/or wet --- or worse, lost --- but I want to know what time it is. If I don't have my own watch, I am constantly bothering neighboring sun bathers who are wearing a watch for the time. This is one of those indestructible time-keepers that can get wet, tolerates sweat in the heat, sun screen won't harm it and it's pretty cute to boot. It's perfect for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A. Radano

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read the time at a glance
customer_reviews.text: The clock face is white and the hands are white and silver. Sometimes the lack of contrast makes it hard for me to see what time it is. I can't just glance at my watch, I have to really look and sometimes that's annoying. I get a lot of compliments on it, but it isn't comfortable for me and although it's small, it still feels bulky. Update: I actually hate this watch. I never wear it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Conney

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! I wanted an inexpensive watch, because I'm tried of paying money to replace the battery in my more expensive watch. Last time I was quoted $30 for the battery! My only water resistance experience with this watch is reaching into a container of water to retrieve something for my granddaughter. It did fine. The band is cheap plastic though, and sometimes when I tighten the strap, the keeper loop pinches my skin. But it fits the bill, inexpensive (under $20) and will replace it with another when the battery dies.
customer_reviews.author: TE

customer_reviews.title: cute watch
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch for my nursing school and love how it will go good with everything. I have small wrists and was pleased with how many holes there are to tighten the watch. The face of the watch is small which is great for me because most times watches look big on my arm. The numbers are easy to see but I need to squint/look more closely to read the time when it's in between the numbers. Overall, I would recommend it and it's a great plus that it is water-resistant, since I will need to wash my hands frequently during clinicals.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: BAND IS NOT WHITE ;T
customer_reviews.text: The face is cute and it has military time on there. Great for a nursing student. ONLY thing is, the "white" band is not as white as the watch face, so that bugs me BIG TIME! It's too late to return this and get a new one...this is what I get for buying last minute. I would suggest a black version of this watch if they have it. I read that this stains a lot and I can totally see it doing that. Well, we'll see!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Really like the watch.
customer_reviews.text: I really love the watch for everyday wear. It's sturdy and the dial is very easy to see. I've seen so many watches lately that don't have numbers. Numbers were a must for me. This one is colorful and has so far kept really exact time. I also noticed that several nurses had bought the watch for the second hand and the fact that it is water resistant. Another must for me. Teresa R.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa J. Reasor

customer_reviews.title: If you want a watch that can take a beating..
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give a review after 6+ months of wearing and putting this watch through pure heck. I am an EMT and bought this watch for it's easy to read numbers, water resistance, but especially for it's second hand to help count BPM while taking vitals. Let me start by saying that this watch has somehow made it's way into the washing machine atleast 10 times. Today I swam in the lake with it, no issues. No water got into the watch and it still works as it should! Highly recommend! The only downside is it will get tinged from dirt after a while. Other than that, I would 10/10 buy again!
customer_reviews.author: SammyJo

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Easy to Read
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch to use during my water aerobics classes. I am completely happy with this purchase. The watch face is easy to read and it has performed perfectly in my shallow and deep water classes or just swimming laps. I have noticed the band has changed color a bit, but that is not a problem for me. I don't wear my glasses when I'm in the pool so this watch has helped me greatly.
customer_reviews.author: tivatime

customer_reviews.title: Casio water resistant watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch was purchased as a present for my wife who is in nursing school. She wanted something waterproof, easy to read and female friendly. The Casio watch looks good and she really loves it. She comments that her classmates keep asking about it and where she got it. Seems rugged enough for some abuse and the band will tighten down to my wife's small wrist.
customer_reviews.author: captain moore

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a beach watch for my GF. She usually wears really nice watches to the beach and she doesn’t care but I constantly worry she is gonna damage. She is obsessed with the silly tan line she has from the watch so insert this little guy. Works at keeping the time and her tan line. Goes well with her beach attire and is fun looking enough to keep on when we go out for happy hour. Goto beach and weekend at the shore watch.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Szypula

customer_reviews.title: Constantly Stops
customer_reviews.text: I wear this for work because phones are not allowed but i have to reset it anytime I leave it off. The hour hand gets hung up on the second and doesn't keep time. I have had this happen while wearing it even. It's cheap and not bad looking but if you need reliable, look elsewhere. I only need it on a short term basis and probably won't ever use it again. Wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Great watch.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch it's comfortable and actually fits my child sized wrist. I even sleep in it with no problem. It's easy to read and easy to set up. The only complaint I have is within a week of me having it the band has a bluegrey tint too it on the edges, and I don't know if it's where the band is wearing already or if I held it against something and it permenatly stained it. The face was a bit smaller than I thought it was going to be but it worked out so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: southern twang

customer_reviews.title: I still like it but just can't wear it for nice events
customer_reviews.text: i am not a watch wearer. i use this if I cannot be on my phone to check the time. I bought the white color. after several use, The straps have discolored and have darkened enough to be noticeable. I often wear it at work and i have long dark sleeves on. It may have touched my sleeves enough to have the pigment be absorbed by the straps so now its dark. I still like it but just can't wear it for nice events... its relegated to rugged outdoor activity.
customer_reviews.author: grain of sand

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for nursing students
customer_reviews.text: Nursing student. What attracted me to this product initially was the fact it is mostly white and the numbers are different colors for every 15 seconds. Which really comes in handy when tracking vital signs amongst other things. It has three hands and the day of the month. Unfortunately you have to toggle with the day of the month constantly, but still worth it. I highly recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Cowballs

customer_reviews.title: ... to get used to reading it and it is great. I love the color of the numbers very ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch because I will be starting the nursing program soon and I wanted to get used to reading it and it is great. I love the color of the numbers very easy to see but I did not realize how small this watch really is, I like mine a little bigger but it does the job. I took one star off because the white band gets easily stained and cannot be cleaned, at least not that I know of. Other than that I look forward to wearing this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this watch and like that it is water resistant. Couldn't wait to get it. However I can't read the time on it so it is not much use. I found the numbers too small and the different colors (that are lovely) make it harder to read for me. Also I found it difficult to change the date and can't read it even with my glasses. The hands are white against a white background which contributes to the difficulty. Am sorry to have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: jamg50

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but hard to read
customer_reviews.text: I like analog watches and this is very cute and clean looking BUT it is WAY harder to read than I would like. I have not gotten it wet - so cannot answer as to water resistance. It is well made. I just wish there was more contrast between the hands and the dial and the date is so small I cannot read it without a magnifying glass. I also wish it was backlit like my timex - the glow does not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Debs Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to wear to work, I am a registered nurse and let's say I am exposed to many body fluids as a labor and delivery nurse! I wanted a watch I could wipe down and not worry about damaging it. The band is rubber so I can sanitize it easily and even wash it in the sink. I love it! It's also colorful and comfortable. Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: KimmyK

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - cute but the date won't stay accurate
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but you get what you pay for. The date doesn't keep up - meaning I set the date but after a couple weeks it is now 3 days behind and counting. But the time is still accurate. It was already on when it arrived so I'm not sure how much of the battery has already been used up? Also, I ordered the white and it is already showing a bit of staining from clothes and usual wear. I'll keep using it through nursing school and likely need to replace it with a nicer, more reliable watch eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Nursing Student Watch
customer_reviews.text: I needed a watch for nursing school, and this has been awesome. It goes with any color and is very easy to read. You need a watch that's easy to read the second hand for nursing school, and this is great. I saw another student wearing the same watch, and she said she loves it, too. It's cute to wear even when not on clinical shifts. I just wipe it off to clean it. It's a great watch for the price. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, but smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and in good condition. I really like the style (white with different colored numbers) however the dial was very small. Unlike the Casio men's watches I've seen and bought. I need this for nursing school, and although this watch has worked for many people, it did not work for me. It was hard to see the seconds, so I have returned. Otherwise great watch at an affordable price!!! Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Joli

customer_reviews.title: Broken from the beginning
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work from the first day I got it. I called the repair shop in New Jersey and they said for me to mail it to them for them to look at (I assumed they would fix it for free because they didn't mention any charges). I spent $7 shipping it and later received a bill for $22, totaling to more than what we bought the watch for in the first place. The battery didn't come under the warranty, but when you get a new product, you expect it to come in working order. A customer should not be expected to pay to fix a product that was dysfunctional from the start. That should come out of the company's pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Efrain Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Game, Set, Match
customer_reviews.text: For tennis, my wife wanted a white sports watch similar to the one I have. One that is light weight, easy to read, water resistant, and attractive. I've had mine for several years. It's almost always on my wrist and I don't think I've ever changed the battery. It takes a licking but keeps on ticking. Now, my wife has one too. I guess you can say we're a match.
customer_reviews.author: John Petralia

customer_reviews.title: Cute watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch. I have very small weprists, so it fits, but if yours are large, this strap would be too small. I wanted a rainproof Watch for morning walks, as I live where it rains a lot. I wasn’t hapoy to have it arrive with the watch running. Who knows how long it was running and running the battery down? Battery replacement is expensive!
customer_reviews.author: shopper48

customer_reviews.title: fit comfortably around wrist
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, fit comfortably around wrist, the display is smaller than I expected (less than 1"), but numbers are large enough
customer_reviews.author: Olga Boyarova

customer_reviews.title: It's nice!
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 star because the date was a day behind. It's good for nursing students. I bought this watch for my clinical time, which I'm going to start pretty soon. The display is small but I like it because has different colors, it makes it easy to read. But the date it's too small to see. I care for the second hand and the band is silicon which it's easy to wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Saeid_Danesh

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality-price score. Waterproof as promised and nice to see. Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a very nice and good quality watch. It was a birthday present for my daughter, who pretty much immediately tested its waterproof property under the kitchen tab. It is indeed waterproof as promised. It already had a few drops on the stone floor from a meter or so, no problem, no scratch whatsoever. (She managed to destroy two cheaper "sports watches" within days.) Owned a Casio sports watch myself as teenager and wanted to see if they still are as reliable as back in the eighties, so far this certainly seems to be the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stops working
customer_reviews.text: *update* After only having this watch for a week it stopped working, battery is still good the watch just isn’t working anymore. I’m very disappointed I loved this watch otherwise, I’m sending it back for a refund. I love this watch! I was looking for something that is waterproof so I wouldn’t have to take off when washing my hands or dishes, it’s very comfortable and practical
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Like the rubber is changing color from wear
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very cute watch I ordered for my daughter, but she has only been wearing it for 4 days and the edges are wearing and turning dark. Like the rubber is changing color from wear. I didn’t expect tears outta this watch, but was hoping for at least a couple months. A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JakeRiley

customer_reviews.title: Has everything I need in a watch, and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great! I bought it for nursing school but started wearing it before I actually “needed” to utilize it for that purpose. I like the multiple colors, as it makes it easy to read quickly and love that it has military time as well. The clock face is smaller than I had anticipated, but overall I love how lightweight and comfortable this watch is. I forget I even have it on when I wear it during my long shifts at work!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Roach

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst watches I have ever owned. It was impossible to set the date correctly even when following the instructions. The instructions state not to set between 8PM and 4AM; but it didn't matter when I set it, it never had the date correct! I had to fix it almost every day. The date also is written so small it's hard to see, and when the date becomes double digits it's hard to see the first number as it is right up against the window.
customer_reviews.author: PorkChop

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute! The only things I don’t like: band not long enough, and I have don’t have a large wrist, and seems too bulky on top of face. It’s also a little too shiny for my liking. However, I think this would be great for a young, petite nursing student, teen or petite nurse. I bought for nursing school.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Barney, RN

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I left the watch in my jean pocket, washed the jeans and fully expected to quit working. The little thing is still going strong. Great for outdoor work!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a watch for working as a nurse. I like the easy read of the military time and the regular numbers. I like that it fit my small wrist and it looks cute and matches all the different scrubs I wear because it’s white. Comfortable on my wrist. Stylish. Battery actually working when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Miller

customer_reviews.title: I like how it looks and works and that its pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is just as advertised, I like how it looks and works and that its pretty water resistant. I bought it to wear at work as a nurse. The Only complaint for me is that I have big wrists for a girl & the longer end keeps flipping out from its holder while Im working & I have to keep tucking it back into place. I imagine this wouldn't be as much of an issue for women with smaller wrists. Otherwise its great : )
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The watch face is very small. The band is very small, if you have a larger wrist, dont bother. The material the band is made of it really slick and doesn't allow the little loop to hold the band after fastened, it slides right out. I wore it for 5 minutes and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorilee

customer_reviews.title: Ok watch for the money
customer_reviews.text: The band is easy to fasten. Overall, the watch is smaller than I expected. The watch face is small and hard for me to read. No instructions with the watch. I haven't figured out how to change the day. Forwarding the dial doesn't work with the stem pulled half out or all the way out.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi A. Reaves

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Nurse Watch
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a watch to use as a nurse that didn't break the bank. I have only had this watch a gew days and I can tell you that it's great for me! Lightweight and I can read the dial. The hands are glow in the dark. Cute colors but not overpowering. Love this watch!!
customer_reviews.author: RyAri

customer_reviews.title: Small. Real small.
customer_reviews.text: You know how women's watches are small to start with? Well this watch is MUCH smaller than you'd think. The date is pretty much unreadable. I got it for a 12 year old girl so it is likely perfect. I was expecting it to be in the Casio/Luminox size but nope! So, this will likely not be a watch she will grow up with. If you are thinking, "Gee I hope it's small" then GET IT!!! If you want bigger then look at the Luminox series. But for under 20 bucks, hey no biggee.
customer_reviews.author: R. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Cute watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I bought this since I'll be a nursing student soon and needed a watch with a second hand. I love that it states military time as well since it will come handy doing clinicals and what not. It's small and perfect for my wrist. Can't wait to put it to great use as a nursing student!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep time properly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for the nursing program I'm in. It was perfect because it had the date, a hand for seconds, it's waterproof, has military time, its easy to read, and looks pretty nice. I followed the directions and set the date when/how it said to, but about two days later I noticed the date was no longer accurate. After about a week, I noticed the time was behind by about six minutes. I would not recommend this watch and will definitely be looking into returning it.
customer_reviews.author: C Smith

customer_reviews.title: Meets my basic needs. Has pro's and cons.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Rotating bezel. Arrow adjusts for a starting point for vitals, etc. (this is quite awesome!! I do appreciate this feature) Waterproof Cute Not too expensive Cons: Wristband feels cheap Wristbands are on the shorter side. (I have medium sized wrists, and I have to wear it on the 2nd to last hole loosely, or tightly on the 3rd to last hole) Purpose for this purchase: A waterproof, 3 hand analog watch is required for nursing program that I am enrolled in. I do not love this watch, but I do like it and it meets my needs. Overall I would recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Chonkworld

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Casual Wear Watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to wear at the riding stables where she gets into water, dirt and dust that would kill a standard ladies dress watch. Although she doesn't need it, the date window is so small you need a magnifying glass to read it. I wanted to get her a ladies Ironman Timex but she doesn't like digital watches.
customer_reviews.author: BillB

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Vacation Watch
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch to go to Atlantis in the Bahamas. I knew i'd be in the water a lot and my phone would be in a locker or waterproof pouch so I wanted a watch i could wear that I wouldn't be afraid to lose. Worked great. You don't know how many people stopped me to ask me what time it was. I'll use it in the pool at home as well. Great watch for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie K. Sturtevant

customer_reviews.title: Best Watch for Nursing or Nursing Students!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little watch and extremely water tolerant for the price. I'm a nursing student and rarely take it off. The band feels kind of cheap but it seems very durable. Its absolutely perfect for nursing school. The colored numbers make it great for HR and Respirations. As for the issues with the day being off: make sure when setting the date/time that you do it around midnight; this will help keep the date from changing at noon or random time the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Leena

customer_reviews.title: This watch is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great for the price! The only problem is that the band turned a bit yellow in the pool. The watch face was fine but the band yellowed. Assuming it was the chlorine. Other than that, great watch! Cute and stylish. Some say the face is too small, but I thought it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Mom

customer_reviews.title: 24 hour + water resistance for thorough handwashing
customer_reviews.text: I just got my 2nd one today. That is how pleased I am with it. It has the 24 hour, date + water resistance. I haven't used it for swimming but, definitely useful for infection control purposes & accurate note taking in 24 hour format. I don't have to worry when washing my hands thoroughly about it getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: takori

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a scrub watch too
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter works in a Vet clinic. I got this for her as a scrub watch/nurse watch. She is very thrilled with it. It is a high quality and fits her very tiny wrist perfectly. The white is flashy and looks clean. The face is water proof enough for sanitizers and sprays but I don't think she would shower with it. She loves it too much! She also gets a lot of compliments from her co-workers.
customer_reviews.author: Celtic crow

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one over three years ago for Nursing....I wash my hands relentlessly and never worry about the water coming in contact with it...keeps great time and the colors on the face go with whatever scrubs I wear...I bought my second one now only because I am hard on my watches and it was getting really ragged appearance wise... although still kept ticking like a charm...
customer_reviews.author: GAIL

customer_reviews.title: Stuff to say
customer_reviews.text: I use it for work because I wash my hands a lot. So far, compared to the other water proof watches I got, it's still working after a few weeks of using it. It's on the small side for me in regards to "looking at the time" since I'm sorta nearly blind. Good for gifting, for teens, for kids. Not good for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Lei

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing to not like! This watch is the most beautiful I had ...
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to not like! This watch is the most beautiful I had in years. I hear compliments every day how nice it is . It fits great. it looks great. It feels great. And it IS great. Easy to see the numbers. It is more like a nice bracelet and the watch in one. Stylish! Love it and suggest to others!
customer_reviews.author: baibabalode7

customer_reviews.title: My favorite watch!
customer_reviews.text: I'm guilty of buying multiples of this watch (I'm also guilty of losing/forgetting my watches)! I love how colorful it is, adding a fun pop to any pair of scrubs. My favorite feature is being able to rotate the bezel (helps me keep track of my lunch break and when to flush meds!). All you new nurses may also appreciate the military time that is displayed. I've purchased other white watches before and this one seems easier to keep clean. Go ahead, give this watch a try!
customer_reviews.author: Danya

customer_reviews.title: It’s a happy happy watch and I my happy owner of it!
customer_reviews.text: What a happy beautiful gorgeous watch! No it’s a white wristband so of course you’re not going to use this as your every day watch on it won’t last very long and it will be your fault!! It’s for special casual dates and appointments. Sparkling gorgeous and bright —-Great job Casio!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T.

customer_reviews.title: It's not perfect sport watch, but no complain either
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of the "fresh looks" and affordable price, I will say this sport watch is not a perfect watch but at the same time I couldn't find any reason to write bad reviews about... the only thing I could think of is have hard time to set the date. if you have big hand/fingers, then you may doesn't like this watch during setting.
customer_reviews.author: Bostwick

customer_reviews.title: A nursing must have
customer_reviews.text: In my line of work I wash my hands a lot and needed a watch that can handle it. The watch has stood the test of time. I have owned it about a year maybe longer and it as dependable as the first day. I love that it also has military time as well. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: latricia davis

customer_reviews.title: Very very Cute and a great Watch 😎
customer_reviews.text: So very cute but professional. A great daily Watch! What a great idea for a nurse or caretaker in your life! I love that the hands glow in the dark. And the date is always on hand 🤗. I have showered with it on although I'm not sure if I can recommend it .. But I am so happy that I treated MYSELF 🙂. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Razzi

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it has issues.
customer_reviews.text: I really like my watch, I accidentally washed it and dried it last week and it hasn't missed a beat. On the flip side, it's not quite 2 months old and the band got discolored badly and the piece on the face of the watch spins around. It's done this from week 1. The washer and dryer boo boo wasn't involved.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy D

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very nice and beautiful . It is functional because the numbers are big enough for me to see the time without using my eyeglass.it is adjustable even to a smallest wrist. I have really small wrist and there is still 3 slots more for smaller adjustment. This is really great watch for the money.
customer_reviews.author: amiable amy

customer_reviews.title: WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this watch! It does everything it says it will do. No worries about putting it into the water. It is easy to read, the numbers are just the right size and each of the 3 hours are different colors. It is very light weight and fits nicely with 10 holes on the watchband. I would recommend it to anyone who swims or works out in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Sam

customer_reviews.title: Nice nursing watch
customer_reviews.text: Just received this watch today to use in nursing. I am glad I read the reviews and chose this watch. The colors are vibrant, which makes reading the numbers easy. The size of the watch is smaller than I believed it would be. Which makes it the perfect size for my small wrist. I believe this is a keeper. The materials should repair water just fine, since as nurses wash your hands constantly.
customer_reviews.author: MEA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect SAT & ACT testing watch.
customer_reviews.text: This was fantastic for taking my SAT and ACT. This has no noises what so ever so there is no risk of noises during testing. Also the outer right rotates so you can move it and keep track of your time since each section has a certain amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little smaller than I thought and the band is getting kind of grimy after two months but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mad

customer_reviews.title: Small and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and understated. I personally love large face watches because I have pretty big hands but for the price and intended use it will be perfect. I just needed something to get me through nursing clinicals. It’s very light and will be easy to clean. Cute packaging and pretty colors on numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Richard

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fun, and functional watch.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It's white which I looked everywhere for and has a shiny band. It's not hot to wear. Haven't sweat yet even though it's a plastic band. I do love the numbers in colors. It's a fun watch to wear. I even check the date every once in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Great but hard to read
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for when we go sailing and I wanted a cheap, waterproof watch. I have had this watch for several years and my husband changed the battery for me. I finally am getting another watch, only because it is very difficult to read the time. While the face of the watch is pretty, it's way too busy and the hands are hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: "...only buy this one if you have very tiny wrists."
customer_reviews.text: This watch says it's for women, but it barely fits around my wrist. I have it on the very last notch and it still feels too tight whenever I wear it. I let my son try it on, and it fit his wrist perfectly. He's 5. If you're an adult looking for an inexpensive watch, only buy this one if you have very tiny wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsi @ Do You Dog-ear?

customer_reviews.title: S M A L L
customer_reviews.text: Ummm.. is it supposed to be this small?!? All the other reviews make this watch look a little bit bigger than this. I was so confused when I opened the packaging because I was expecting it to look bigger, this looks like it’s supposed to be for a child’s wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: I work in an area where clocks are not visible from a distance. I need a watch to tell when it is break time/quit time/etc. Some departments use computers. Others do not. I also have allergies to metal so I needed to have a silicone band. I keep it attached to my supply bag since wearing a watch interferes with the job.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Nursing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch to use in nursing school and it’s been great. It’s water proof, which is good for all the hand washing. The face includes the day of the month which helps with notes, and it also has a rotating second marker (15, 30, 45, 60) which is perfect for taking pulses/resp. rates, etc. The multicolored numbers are also pretty cute.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Elbourn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy timepiece
customer_reviews.text: I am a vet tech and have owned this watch for about 9 months. So far it has stood up to every bump, smash, and fluid thrown its way. The material is also easy to disinfect. The white band has become a bit discolored, but I believe that is more related to my work than the quality of the watch. I also appreciate the fun colors and the 24-hour time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, dis colors quickly
customer_reviews.text: Wore this for a month at the beginning of nursing school. The band had turned a strange gray/brown color but the watch face is still white. I'm dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Simple watch
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Perfect for nurses! When I wash my hands, it still works fine. Great to use for counting. Affordable. You can rotate the face. Only downside is that it will change colors. No surprise considering the material and color though.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch but the band is turning green
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch but I have had it less than 5 weeks and the band is starting to turn green. I'm in school to be a MA so I only wear it 4 hours 4 days a weeks so I feel like it shouldnt be green yet. I'm sad because I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and useful!
customer_reviews.text: I am in a masters program and need this watch for healthcare settings. This watch is perfect because it’s material is easy to clean and it is waterproof! I love the white with the rainbow display, and it fits on my wrist perfectly, with many settings to fit your size. Low cost, and I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: got this at the start of my nursing program. Just about to finish it up and its still working great! absolutely love! I dont like wearing a nice watch to work in healthcare, so I love wearing this watch (Its my work only watch).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Girl
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is at the age where I want her to learn to be accountable to doing things at the times we agree on, but young enough that she's still earning to take care of things. She thinks this watch is stylish, I like that it's indestructible. Win-win.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for nursing clinical's!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch to use for my nursing clinical's and this watch was really handy. It's a tad bit smaller than I had originally thought, but it's still a good size where you can tell the numbers, the colorful numbers really help to see them more clearly!
customer_reviews.author: Lizette Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Good for swimming
customer_reviews.text: I use it to swim laps once a week. Hasn't quit yet. I'm swimming in a salt water pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but this feels like thin strap
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, but it's tiny. The picture makes the face of the watch seem bigger. I have a very similar one I use for work & it is A LOT bigger and my straps are thicker. Same brand, but this feels like thin strap. It had arrived with the watch ticking already (not properly packaged& who knows how much battery life was wasted) you definitely get what you pay for with this. I am giving 3 stars for the watch looking like the picture and "working"... hope it's helpful. Wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great, simple watch for nursing
customer_reviews.text: I had a baby-g watch for nursing school, but the seconds were digital, and I found myself having trouble keeping time for meds and vitals with that watch. I ordered this watch and it’s a perfect simple watch for school. I haven’t had a chance to test the water resistance but for what I needed and the price, I couldn’t ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Crabb

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the BEST sports watches!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have ordered.....the last over 5 years ago. It’s my go-to sports watch. Functional, good looking and grandchildren proof. The white band had somewhat yellowed over time and sun, so I bought another to have when I feel this one isn’t as ready for public display as it has been. GREAT WATCH!!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute little watch
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty, love the colored numbers, size is adequate for my wrist that is very skinny but the number for the date is way too small; and this was the reason I selected this watch over others that did not have date. Also I would like the color of the hands to be darker so they could be more visible. But, above all, Im keeping the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Amador

product_meta.title: Casio Women's LRW200H-7BVCF Watch
product_meta.description:
Simple and compact, these dive inspired ladies 3-hand analog timepieces feature 100M water resistance, a bi-directional rotating bezel and date display. Available with hour numerals or markers. Gloss white resin band analog watch with multi-colored face. To set the time - pull out the crown. Set the hands by rotating the crown.



CasioWith the launch of its first watch in November 1974, Casio entered the wristwatch market at a time when the watch industry had just discovered digital technology. As a company with cutting-edge electronic technology developed for pocket calculators, Casio entered this field confident that it could develop timepieces that would lead the market.

Today, Casio is focusing its efforts on solar-powered radio-controlled watches: the built-in solar battery eliminates the nuisance of replacing batteries, atomic timekeeping means the users never have to reset the time. Recently, Casio launched a series of Bluetooth watches that sync to the users cell phone to automatically update the time. Casio is always moving time forward.






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :2.3 x 4.5 x 3.2 inches; 2.88 Ounces
 * Item model number :LRW200H-7BVCF
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :March 19, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Casio
 * ASIN :B00791QYMQ
 * 
 * Domestic Shipping:Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
 * International Shipping:This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #1,698 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #932 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #1 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars6,341 ratings Simple and compact, these dive inspired ladies 3-hand analog timepieces feature 100M water resistance, a bi-directional rotating bezel and date display. Available with hour numerals or markers. Gloss white resin band analog watch with multi-colored face. To set the time - pull out the crown. Set the hands by rotating the crown.



CasioWith the launch of its first watch in November 1974, Casio entered the wristwatch market at a time when the watch industry had just discovered digital technology. As a company with cutting-edge electronic technology developed for pocket calculators, Casio entered this field confident that it could develop timepieces that would lead the market.

Today, Casio is focusing its efforts on solar-powered radio-controlled watches: the built-in solar battery eliminates the nuisance of replacing batteries, atomic timekeeping means the users never have to reset the time. Recently, Casio launched a series of Bluetooth watches that sync to the users cell phone to automatically update the time. Casio is always moving time forward.
feature_bullets: All-white watch featuring bi-directoinal bezel and round dial with pastel-tone 12-hour indices, small 24-hour indices, and date window at 3 o'clock
33 mm resin case with mineral dial window
Japanese quartz movement with analog display
Molded resin band with buckle closure
Water resistant to 100 m (330 ft): In general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not scuba diving.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
